name: Chicken and Cheese Quesadillas
description: Make this warm and cheesy recipe in less than 15 minutes!
preparation: Combine first 4 ingredients together in mixing bowl.
Lay 6 tortillas on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Divide mixture between tortillas, spreading to within 1⁄2" (1 cm) of edge. Sprinkle each with 3 Onion Dip Mix.
Top each with another tortilla. Bake for 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
Serving suggestion: serve with Sheet Pan Caesar Salad.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
